dct_title_s: Map of the upper Binué River, from a survey by Mr E. R. Flegel of the Church Missionary Society's expedition, 1879 in continuation of admiralty chart no. 2446 on same scale
dct_description_sm: Swamps, vegetation, cultivated areas, rocks, and anchorages along river are shown. Depth shown by soundings in fathoms. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Altitudes given in feet above river. Inset map of Central Africa [scale ca. 1:8,448,000] includes physical features and names of territories. From: Proceedings of the Royal Geographical Society and monthly record of geography. Vol. 2 (1880), no. 5, pp. 289-305; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J6873
dct_subject_sm: Benue River (Cameroon and Nigeria)—Description and travel
dcat_theme_sm: Benue River (Cameroon and Nigeria)—Description and travel
